price: ߤߍ߲߬ ߊߟߎ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߬ ߸ ߊߟߎ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߏ ߦߋ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߴߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߊ߯ߙߌߓߊ߮ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߕߊ߲߬ߘߏ߬ߕߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ أَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu antumu al-fuqarāu ilā al-lahi wal-lahu huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
